name: Crystal Tower
description:
Entry for Adaptive Music Game Jam

Collect 12 crystals hidden on the map to lower the tower!

There are secrets and 3 endings ;)

Controls:
Look around - mouse
Interact - left mouse button
Move - WASD or arrow keys
Jump - space or right ctrl
Sprint - shift or numpad 0

Okmops - adaptive music, sound effects, Wwise integration
Silvarc - programming, environment, shaders
